consecrated.name: Purified
consecrated.description: A holy energy fills the area

healing.name: Restorative
healing.description: A soothing energy permeates the area

calm.name: Serene
calm.description: Your mind is strangely at peace in this area

energizing.name: Vigor
energizing.description: A revitalizing energy fills the room

toxic.name: Toxicity
toxic.description: The air is thick with poisonous fumes

miasma.name: Miasma
miasma.description: An oppressive aura saps your strength and willpower

cold.name: Frigid
cold.description: A biting cold permeates the area, chilling you to the bone

evil.name: Malevolent
evil.description: A dark energy fills this room, unsettling all who enter

claustrophobic.name: Claustrophobic
claustrophobic.description: The confined space makes it hard to breathe and think clearly

catacombs: dense catacombs, walls lined with ancient tombs and sarcophagi.
fane: ancient fane. There is a lingering scent of incense. The walls are adorned with faded murals depicting long-forgotten deities.
ossuary: ancient ossuary. It is eerie and silent. Rows of skeletal remains line the walls, and a sense of unease lingers.
mortuary_garden: overgrown mortuary garden. The air is redolent with decaying flowers. Amid cracked statues and broken fountains, a sense of sorrow lingers.
phylactery: dark phylactery chamber charged with malevolent energy. The walls are adorned with ancient runes, and a sinister energy emanates from the center.
ritual_chamber: ritual chamber dense with smoke from burning candles. Carvings of dark symbols adorn the walls, and a powerful energy pulses.
dark_altar: twisted altar room overflowing with an oppressive energy. The walls are adorned with sinister engravings of cruel rituals. An irredeemable malevolence pulsates from within.
garden: serene garden, the air filled with the scent of blooming flowers. Sunlight filters through the leaves, casting dappled shadows on the ground.
cloister: quiet cloister, the sound of rustling leaves and chirping birds filling the air. The walls are covered in ivy, and a sense of peace pervades the area.
narthex: spacious narthex, the air filled with the scent of polished wood and stone. The walls are adorned with intricate carvings, and a sense of reverence hangs in the air.
praetorium: grand praetorium, the air heavy with the scent of incense and polished stone. The walls are adorned with banners and tapestries, and a sense of authority fills the space.
crypt: cold crypt whose air is heavy and still. You can hear the faint sound of dripping water.
alcove: hidden alcove, tucked away behind a crumbling wall.
secret alcove, filled with ancient artifacts and treasures.
undisturbed alcove, the air thick with dust and cobwebs.
altar: sacred altar, the air filled with the scent of incense. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
archive: dusty archive, the shelves filled with ancient scrolls and tomes. The air is thick with the scent of old paper and ink, and you can hear the faint rustling of pages.
armory: armory, the walls lined with racks of weapons and armor. The air is filled with the scent of oil and metal, and you can hear the faint clanging of blacksmiths at work.
barracks: barracks, the air filled with the scent of sweat and leather. The walls are lined with bunks and lockers, and you can hear the faint snoring of soldiers.
cell: damp cell. The walls are covered in scratches and graffiti, and the air is thick with despair.
chamber: dimly lit chamber, the walls adorned with ancient tapestries. A faint glow emanates from a mysterious artifact in the center.
corridor: corridor, the stone walls echoing your footsteps. The air is damp and musty, and you can hear distant sounds of movement.
guardroom: guardroom, the air filled with the scent of sweat and metal. The walls are lined with weapons and armor, and you can hear the faint chatter of guards.
hall: long hallway, the ceiling towering above you. The walls are lined with suits of armor and ancient weapons, and a sense of history hangs in the air.
lair: dark lair, the air thick with the scent of decay. The walls are covered in strange markings, and you can hear the faint sound of breathing.
library: dusty library, the shelves filled with ancient tomes and scrolls. The air is thick with the scent of old paper and ink, and you can hear the faint rustling of pages.
reliquary: sacred reliquary, the air filled with reverence. The walls are adorned with ancient relics and artifacts, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
sanctum: hidden sanctum, the air thick with mystery. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
scriptorium: quiet scriptorium, the air filled with the scent of parchment and ink. The walls are lined with desks and quills, and you can hear the faint scratching of pens.
shrine: sacred shrine, the air filled with reverence. The walls are adorned with ancient symbols and offerings, and a powerful aura emanates from the center.
study: quiet study, the air filled with the scent of old books and leather. The walls are lined with shelves of knowledge, and you can hear the faint scratching of quills.
tavern: bustling tavern filled with the scent of ale and roasted meat. The air is thick with laughter and the clinking of mugs.
throne_room: grand throne room, the walls lined with towering pillars and the floor covered in intricate mosaics. A majestic throne sits at the far end, guarded by a fearsome creature.
treasury: glittering treasury, the walls lined with shelves of gold and jewels. The air is thick with the scent of wealth and power, and you can hear the faint clinking of coins.
vault: secure vault, the air heavy with the scent of old wood and metal. The walls are lined with locked chests and safes, and you can hear the faint ticking of hidden mechanisms.
watchtower: watchtower, the air crisp and cold. The walls are lined with windows offering a panoramic view of the surrounding landscape, and you can hear the faint sound of birds.

memorial_altar.name: healing memory
memorial_altar.description: A shrine to the honored dead. Fresh flowers somehow still bloom here. You feel a soothing warmth in the air.

sealed_sarcophagus.name: ancient treasure
sealed_sarcophagus.description: An ornate sarcophagus sealed with wax and ancient binding runes. There is a faint aura of necrotic energy surrounding it.

pure_fountain.name: font blessing
pure_fountain.description: A pristine fountain bubbles in the center of the room. The water looks crystal clear.

polluted_fountain.name: font blessing
polluted_fountain.description: A fountain graces the center of the room. The water looks murky.

arcane_circle.name: mana surge
arcane_circle.description: An arcane circle is inscribed on the floor, glowing faintly with magical energy.

deepwood_table.name: nature's boon
deepwood_table.description: A table carved from an ancient tree stands in the center of the room, adorned with leaves and flowers.

cold_iron_altar.name: iron ward
cold_iron_altar.description: An altar forged from cold iron stands in the center of the room, radiating a protective aura.

deepwater_well.name: well of fate
deepwater_well.description: An ancient well filled with dark, still water. The air around it feels heavy with destiny.

temple: #race + " heretics serve a dark master at their fane deep in the " + #terrain
#race + " cultists have been spotted close to a hidden shrine " + #direction + " of us"
#bossName + " is hiding in a secret sanctum " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is holed up in a sacred reliquary to the " + #direction + " of town"
fortress: #race + " raiders have been sighted near the fort " + #direction + " of here"
"an army of " + #race + "s was observed near the ancient " + #dungeon_type
#bossName + " is holed up in a fortress " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " leads a band of " + #race + "s in a stronghold " + #direction + " of here"
library: #race + "s have been spotted in close proximity to a reliquary " + #direction + " of town"
#race + " scholars have been hoarding forbidden knowledge in a secret library"
#bossName + " is said to be hiding in a hidden archive " + #direction + " of here"
'travelers speak of ' + #bossName + ' and their ' + #race + ' cult seeking a hidden scriptorium'
tomb: "watch out for " + #race + "s lurking in the " + #direction + "ern necropolis"
"the catacombs have been taken over by " + #race + "s"
#race + "s have been seen revelling in a haunted tomb " + #direction + " of our location"
#bossName + " is said to be hiding in a secret crypt " + #direction + " of here"
mine: "the old delve just " + #direction + " of town is now home to a tribe of " + #race + "s"
#race + "s occupy an abandoned mine " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is hiding in a hidden cavern " + #direction + " of here"
#bossName + " is said to be holed up in a secret lair in the " + #direction

groups.pressure_plate: "a barely visible pressure plate embedded in the floor"
groups.tripwire: "a thin wire stretched across the passageway at ankle height"
groups.hidden_switch: "a concealed switch hidden among the wall carvings"
groups.magical_rune: "a glowing rune inscribed on the floor that pulses with arcane energy"
groups.arcane_glyph: "an intricate glyph etched into the wall, shimmering faintly"
groups.enchanted_object: "an ordinary-looking object that hums with magical power"

groups.glowing_runes: runes that glow with an inner light, pulsing softly.
groups.levitating_objects: various objects levitating gently in the air, defying gravity.
groups.ethereal_music: a haunting melody that seems to come from nowhere, filling the air.
groups.shifting_walls: walls that subtly shift and change position when not being observed.
groups.enchanted_statues: a statue that appears to move slightly when not directly looked at.
groups.ancient_trees: a massive tree with gnarled roots and a trunk that seems to pulse with life.
groups.time_dilation: an area where time seems to pass differently
groups.illusory_visions: visions that appear and disappear at the edge of your sight.
groups.enchanted_aura: a shimmering aura that seems to protect the area from harm.
groups.whispering_voices: soft whispers that seem to come from the walls themselves.
groups.spectral_figures: ghostly figures that move silently through the area.
groups.magical_weather: weather phenomena that seem to be controlled by magic.
groups.floating_lights: small lights that float in the air, moving in intricate patterns.
groups.color_shifts: colors that shift and change in a mesmerizing way.
groups.unearthly_silence: a profound silence that seems to absorb all sound.
groups.glowing_crystals: a crystal that emits a soft, radiant glow.
groups.mysterious_portal: a swirling portal that seems to lead to another place.
groups.arcane_symbols: symbols that glow with magical energy, pulsing rhythmically.
groups.mystical_fog: a thick fog that seems to have a life of its own.
groups.celestial_glow: a soft glow that seems to come from the heavens themselves.
groups.intelligent_painting: a painting that seems to change and shift, depicting different scenes.
groups.living_statue: a statue that appears to move and breathe when not being observed.
groups.enchanted_mirror: a mirror that shows not just reflections, but glimpses of other places.
groups.magical_fountain: a fountain that flows with water imbued with magical properties.
groups.eternal_candle: a candle that burns without ever melting, its flame flickering eternally.
groups.floating_disk: a disk that hovers in the air, rotating slowly.
groups.mystic_compass: a compass that always points toward a place of great magical power.
groups.arcane_clock: a clock that seems to measure time in a non-linear fashion.
groups.enchanted_tapestry: a tapestry that depicts scenes that seem to move and change.
groups.magical_lantern: a lantern that emits a light that reveals hidden truths.
groups.living_book: a book that seems to write itself, its pages filled with ever-changing text.
groups.phantom_flame: a flame that burns without heat, flickering in the air.
groups.singing_crystal: a crystal that emits a melodious sound when touched.
groups.dancing_lights: lights that move and dance in intricate patterns.
groups.shimmering_veil: a veil of shimmering light that seems to separate two realms.
groups.whispering_tree: a tree that seems to whisper secrets to those who listen.
groups.phantasmal_orb: an orb that glows with an inner light, showing visions of distant places.
groups.enchanted_grove: a grove of trees that seem to radiate magical energy.
groups.endless_staircase: a staircase that seems to go on forever, leading to unknown places.
groups.mystic_statue: a statue that seems to radiate an aura of ancient power.
groups.dreamscape_portal: a portal that seems to lead to a realm of dreams and imagination.
groups.timeworn_relic: an ancient relic that seems to pulse with the energy of ages past.
groups.arcane_sculpture: a sculpture that seems to shift and change form when not being observed.
groups.celestial_map: a map that depicts the starfall_crystals and constellations of distant realms.
groups.ethereal_fountain: a fountain that flows with water from another plane of existence.
groups.mystical_jewel: a jewel that emits a soft, radiant light, pulsing with magical energy.
groups.enchanted_obelisk: an obelisk inscribed with runes of great power.
groups.living_mural: a mural that seems to depict scenes that change and shift over time.
groups.magical_sundial: a sundial that seems to measure time in a mystical way.
groups.phantom_garden: a garden that seems to bloom with flowers of ethereal beauty.
groups.arcane_well: a well that seems to draw water from other planes of existence.
groups.enchanted_flute: a flute that produces haunting melodies when played.
groups.eerie_chimes: chimes that produce otherworldly sounds when the wind blows.
groups.mystic_pedestal: a pedestal that seems to radiate magical energy.
groups.glowing_pool: a pool that glows with a soft, radiant light.
groups.oathstone_circle: a circle of stones that seem to bind those who stand within it to their oaths.
groups.arcane_tree: a tree that seems to grow magical energy within its branches.
groups.enchanted_statue_garden: a garden filled with statues that seem to come to life when not being observed.
groups.petrified_forest: a forest of petrified trees that seem to pulse with ancient energy.
groups.celestial_observatory: an observatory that seems to connect to the stars and celestial realms.
groups.seeing_stone: a polished stone that allows one to see distant places or events.
groups.time_stop_aura: an aura that can temporarily halt the flow of time within its vicinity.
groups.phoenix_heart: a radiant heart that pulses with fiery energy, symbolizing rebirth and immortality.
groups.void_singularity: a swirling vortex of darkness that seems to absorb all light and matter around it.
groups.dragon_statue: a majestic statue of a dragon that seems almost alive, its eyes gleaming with intelligence.
groups.celestial_fountain: a fountain that flows with water imbued with celestial energy, healing those who drink from it.
groups.eternal_flame: a flame that burns without fuel, its light never fading.
groups.shadow_portal: a dark portal that seems to lead to a shadowy realm.
groups.storm_core: a swirling core of storm energy, crackling with lightning.
groups.life_tree: a magnificent tree that radiates life energy, its leaves shimmering with vitality.
groups.arcane_lantern: a lantern that emits a magical light, illuminating hidden truths.
groups.soul_mirror: a mirror that reflects not just physical appearances, but the true nature of one's soul.
groups.mythic_portal: a portal that connects to legendary realms and mythical places.
groups.divine_aegis: an invulnerable sphere of light imbued with divine protection.
groups.enchanted_labyrinth: an intelligent painting of a labyrinth that shifts and changes, confounding those who enter.
groups.titan_golem: a colossal golem imbued with the strength of titans.
groups.starfall_crystal: a crystal formed from fallen stars, radiating cosmic energy.
groups.ancient_obelisk: a towering obelisk inscribed with ancient runes of power.
groups.mystic_conduit: a conduit that channels mystical energies from other planes of existence.
groups.eternal_garden: a garden that blooms eternally, filled with plants of otherworldly beauty.

mythic_portal.location: =oneOf(Arcadia, Cthelll, Gehenna, Hades, Limbo, Mechanus, Pandemonium, Ysgard, Zephyrus)

groups.Prime Material: the mundane world of everyday life, where magic is present but not overwhelming.
groups.Arcadia: a lush, idyllic realm of eternal spring, where nature thrives and harmony reigns.
groups.Cthelll: a dark, swampy plane shrouded in mist and mystery, home to ancient secrets and lurking dangers.
groups.Gehenna: a fiery, volcanic landscape filled with treacherous terrain and the echoes of eternal conflict.
groups.Hades: a shadowy underworld of gloom and despair, where lost souls wander and forgotten knowledge lies buried.
groups.Limbo: a chaotic desert wasteland where the sands shift unpredictably and reality bends to whimsy.
groups.Mechanus: a realm of perfect order and precision, where everything operates like clockwork in harmonious balance.
groups.Pandemonium: a tumultuous plane of howling winds and swirling chaos, where nothing remains constant for long.
groups.Ysgard: a frigid, mountainous realm of valor and heroism, where mighty warriors clash amidst snowstorms.
groups.Zephyrus: a vibrant forested plane perpetually stirred by thunderstorms, alive with elemental energy.

easy.question: What has keys but can't open locks?
What has a heart that doesn't beat?
I am not alive, but I grow; I don't have lungs, but I need air; I don't have a mouth, but water kills me. What am I?
I am always hungry, I must always be fed. The finger I touch will soon turn red. What am I?
The person who makes it, sells it. The person who buys it never uses it. The person who uses it never knows they're using it. What is it?
What has to be broken before you can use it?
What begins with T, ends with T, and has T in it?

medium.question: I speak without a mouth and hear without ears. I have nobody, but I come alive with wind. What am I?
The more of this there is, the less you see. What is it?
I have cities, but no houses; forests, but no trees; and rivers, but no water. What am I?
What can run but never walks, has a mouth but never talks, has a head but never weeps, has a bed but never sleeps?
What comes once in a minute, twice in a moment, but never in a thousand years?
What can bring back the dead; make us cry, make us laugh, make us young; is born in an instant, yet lasts a lifetime?
What goes up but never comes down?
What begins without ending and is the ending of all beginnings?
What is easy to lift but hard to throw?

hard.question: I turn once, what is out will not get in. I turn again, what is in will not get out. What am I?
What can fill a room but takes up no space?
What is seen in the middle of March and April that can't be seen at the beginning or end of either month?
What flies without wings and cries without eyes?
The more you take, the more you leave behind. What am I?
What has roots as nobody sees, Is taller than trees, Up, up it goes, And yet it never grows?
Voiceless it cries, Wingless flutters, Toothless bites, Mouthless mutters.
What has a bottom at the top?
I'm quick when I'm thin and slow when I'm fat. The wind is my enemy.
I disappear when you say my name.
I lie behind the stars and underneath the ancient hills. I always come first and yet follow after, end every life and silence laughter.
What has four fingers and a thumb but is not alive?
You can keep me only once you give me away.

deadly.question: What has a head, a tail, is brown, and has no legs?
I am taken from a mine and shut up in a wooden case, from which I am never released, and yet I am used by almost every person. What am I?
What can travel around the world while staying in the same spot?
What has one eye but can't see?
What has many teeth but can't bite?
What has hands but can't clap?
What has a neck but no head?
What has an eye but cannot see?
What can you catch but not throw?
What goes through cities and fields, but never moves?
I always was, yet never will be.
I travel the world, yet stay in a corner.
